snippet: Alexandre Pato reminded the world why he was once the hottest prospect in football with a sensational display in Villarreal's 3-1 win at Sporting Gijon on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Alexandre Pato reminded the world why he was once the hottest prospect in football with a sensational display in Villarreal's 3-1 win at Sporting Gijon on Saturday.

headline.main: Forgotten Man Pato Produces Blast From the Past at Sporting Gijon
headline.print_headline: Forgotten Man Pato Produces Blast From the Past at Sporting Gijon
